title: Ep240 Punk is Dead
description:
This week, the gals put on their studded leather jackets to rage about some counter-culture criminals. Topics include an unfortunate overlap in hairstyles, one very scary masked terrorist, and a violent group who definitely wasn't there for the music. Grab a glass of Anarchist Wine Co.'s 15 Minutes of Fame, change your locks, and tune in for Punk Is Dead.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
